scripts.say: So you were the ones chosen by the Creator. I have no choice but to acknowledge the gap in power between us.
I now finally understand what my dreams mean. That there is a real world that lies beyond this mirrored one...
And in that real world, there is another me who is fighting for Ironblood...
Hahah... "Fight for your hopes and beliefs"... That's what I've always been unable to do in this world...
If you happen to meet me again... could you tell me something? ...That "I want you to fight proudly till the very end"...

sequence:
Farewell, 
the other "me" beyond the mirror that I will never meet...
